lead_paragraph: No amount of preparation is enough to snuff out the threat of Argentina's "assassin" Lionel Messi, Panama coach Hernan Dario Gomez said ahead of Friday's Copa America clash between the teams.

headline.print_headline: Assassin Messi Could Be Unstoppable: Panama Coach
headline.main: Assassin Messi Could Be Unstoppable: Panama Coach

snippet: No amount of preparation is enough to snuff out the threat of Argentina's "assassin" Lionel Messi, Panama coach Hernan Dario Gomez said ahead of Friday's Copa America clash between the teams....
